“Or, rather, a way of living which metamorphoses the assemblage of the bird and the space within time. Something has happened. Territory is therefore not a spatial issue but rather something which is played out according to a system of intensities and temporality – that is to say, according to a rhythm. It is, to return to von Uexküll, a lived space, but more particularly one which is lived in an intense way – in other words, one permeated by different intensities”. (Despret, Vinciane. Vivir como un pájaro)
